JOB DESCRIPTION:
The individual should be self-motivated,  creative and proactive,  to work successfully in a fast-paced environment including multiple platforms and architectures,  diverse technologies and lab environments.
 The individual should have strong knowledge in Core Java,  Struts,  Java & J2EE concepts with strong database skills in MySQL,  SQL Server and Oracle.


Enterprise web application development in an integrated team environment
Write design and test document
Conduct peer review (design and code) meeting
Develop code based on user requirements in Java
Unit Testing: Coding,  testing,  and debugging
Trouble shoot production issues
Individual contributor as part of a team working in full life cycle software development cycles
Hands-on new development as well as support,  maintenance and enhancement of existing applications
Should be ready for onsite opportunities
At least 0-1 year of experience with Java programming: applications,  data analysis,  database applications
Strong experience with Core Java,  Struts,  Java & J2EE concepts
Knowledge about Jboss,  Tomcat Web Server
Basic knowledge for HTML,  CSS,  Jquery,  AJAX
Strong database skills with MySQL,  SQL Server and Oracle
